cleaned_text: By [Dr Devinder Bansi](/doctor/devinder-bansi) 12.07.22 [Gastroenterologist](/doctor/gastroenterology-specialty/) [ Nothing to lose? The of innovative new weight loss treatment ESG ](/medical-articles/nothing-to-lose-the-benefits-of-innovative-new-weight-loss-treatment-esg) Laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy's (LSG) invasive nature comes with complications such as bleeding and leakage. Award-winning gastroenterologist Dr Devinder Bansi discusses how a newer, less-invasive bariatric procedure for weight loss called endoscopic sleeve gastroplasty (ESG), is being introduced into his surgical practise. Read on to find out more.
